use_cases_desc: Adding UIs to objects (e.g., printer); Interact with environment (e.g., pick color from surrounding objects); Always-visible clipboard
contribution_desc: Proposes a HWD system that visualizes input mechanisms across collocated displays using AR for seamless interaction. Interactions between screens can also be visualized and be observed. Virtual screens are also possible to extend displays. Virtual displays can also be added to display-less objects, such as printers to visualize the queue.
tracking_characteristic: Multiple screens; Inside-out tracking; Tracking devices only; Location 2D
crossdevice_def: cross-device interaction; multi-display use; multi-display environments
